author: Fextralife
description:
Assasin’s Creed Shadows Review
In this Assassin’s Creed Shadows review, we’ll be taking an in-depth look at the latest installment of the AC franchise, which is set in Japan during the Sengoku period.

https://fextralife.com/assassins-creed-shadows-review/

For our review, I want to say that this will probably be one of the most controversial reviews we do because I won’t shy away from criticism or praise, and I will be brutally honest about my feelings on it. This isn’t a bashing review nor one that simply praises the game, and our scoring system takes into account factors like game size and pricepoint so if you plan to skip right to the end without reading through, don’t be surprised that other factors affect the final score.

If you truly care for a nuanced opinion on whether Assassin’s Creed Shadows is a game worth buying and want to get a good understanding of what you can expect from this experience, sit back and listen all the way to the end so I explain why AC Shadows is both
title: Assasin’s Creed Shadows Review: Let me be BRUTALLY honest...
